column1: Smoque BBQ////A few minutes later we were inside and waiting to order.  The decor is nice
column2: with the articles about Smoque from the New York Times as well as the Food Network from when Diners
column3: Drive-ins and Dives came to film.  We got up to the counter and ordered.  I got the Pulled Pork Sandwich with a side of Mac 'N Cheese.  We moved out of the way and waited for the staff to find us a table for 7 people.
